title: Founder & Tech Lead
details: Created an ecosystem of 1400+ developers where we provide resources, roadmaps, opportunities updates.Connecting hustlers and professionals with like-minded developers with the moto 'Learn and Grow Together'

title: Project Admin
details: Helped folks to begin with Open-source. Created an environment of working in a team among the young hustlers.Successfully merged 80+ PRs after providing proper guidance to the Open Source Enthusiast.
